articles.title: Xbox Game Pass has four games confirmed for June so far - TrueAchievements
articles.description: So far, four games have already been confirmed for Xbox Game Pass in June 2025, including Remedy Entertainment's co-op shooter, FBC: Firebreak.

articles.title: Deals For Today: Pokémon TCG Sealed Product, Plus Surprise Gaming Keyboard and Mouse Discounts - IGN
articles.description: As of May 12, save on Pokémon TCG sealed product, Legend of Zelda books in Amazon’s B2G50 sale, plus surprise discounts on gaming keyboards and mice from Corsair and GravaStar.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge LIVE: All the big Unpacked news as it's announced - Tom's Guide
articles.description: Samsung's about to add a thin phone to its lineup

articles.title: Google Keep brings text formatting to the web - The Verge
articles.description: NGoogle Keep has finally expanded the text formatting options for its web app, almost two years after making them available for Android users.

articles.title: The Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra is a fantastic Android phone I hate using - Android Authority
articles.description: I've spent a month with the Galaxy S25 Ultra, and by all accounts, it's an excellent phone. I just wish I didn't hate using it.

articles.title: Campagnolo makes huge U-turn as new groupset breaks cover at Giro d'Italia - Cyclingnews
articles.description: Campagnolo Super Record Wireless goes 13 speed, but Italian brand ditches current shifter design following the controversial removal of the historic thumb shifter
